channel.title: This is a real development project!
channel.description:
I'm gathering some developers for a project which will soon be started on. I'm hoping to writing all the content from scratch and with the right developers I'm sure we could scramble something sexy!
All project details are currently unknown due to the fact nothing has been started and having a team to discuss the upcoming of the server I'm certain that we'll produce something worth getting acknowledged. Enough said I'm considering a 503+ server (favorites) with a couple of 600/700+ features (not using any crappy 317 stuff) to create that uniqueness because we're not Jagex, and no way going to create a remake.
Enough said here's my sexy development/advertisement poster! (which is uncompleted and has like 1% with this topic, but it looked good?)
[center][img]http://victoriaconnelly.co.uk/i.png[/img][/center]
For those interested in applying please fill out the application form BELOW!
[code=Application Form LOLZ]- Application Form -
(note: everything marked with * is required)
*Name(nicknames are accepted): Age: *Your skills e.g. programming knowledge, graphics, non-computing etc: A nice little reason why you would like to join the team: Any specific role wanted:
- END of application - [/code]
[size=14pt]Tank you gais :rolleyes:[/size]

item.title: This is a real development project!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Samih1996:

Nice to know that you want to start a project but it would be good if you could specify which kind of people you need help from like make a list, you may need 3 mods, 4 coders, 2 web developers… all that kinds of stuff.

It really does not matter too me who I have because I know really skilled people in everything there is too it who would gladly contribute and I’m capable of doing this alone but having people actually contribute would be better then me just stressing myself. A few developers would be nice etc and I’m not the person who “keeps their code private” so I’d even make this open source if developers are fully okay with that.

Uncalled:

Looks like something that could turn up nicely if you gathered the correct team in. I hope that this continues, and will be worth watching. Any updates on this, yet?

I’ve been having some irl issues which need sorting out baddddd :’(
The only updates so far is probby my design idea’s and getting my logic correct lol :L

All will be reveled once I get some development started!

Edit: my images vanished must re upload!

Read full topic

All project details are currently unknown due to the fact nothing has been started and having a team to discuss the upcoming of the server I’m certain that we’ll produce something worth getting acknowledged. Edit: ^ It’s actually really hard lol :L

item.source: This is a real development project!

item.title: This is a real development project!
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:6, topic:519206”][quote author=hadlich4 link=topic=637665.msg4298657#msg4298657 date=1368632106]

are you going to add anything unique or just basic stuff like every other rsps? just wondering

Well I’ve got a 530 style with content & the render from 639 client including the new hp marks but old items. I’ve got an idea for a 530/639 blend but it all depends if I’ll be getting support on this or whether something different should be done.

Once again this is not a 317!

well what i mean is like are you going to add your own unique features as in something totally different from what jagex has already done. all servers are basically the same just replicating jagex, not putting them down or anything just saying that itd be nicer if someone came up with something of their own for once ya know. atleast thats what im doing, embattled was doin it and froyoscape started but quit, so ima go all the way with it, i got enough support and team members that it should all work out good.
[/quote]

If any creativity was to spark up a brilliant idea I would deffo put it into code

Good luck with your project :)[/quote]

thanks man appreciate it, me amy webb and poopler i think and a few other people are working on it

Read full topic
